snippet: The move is to reduce the influence of the governors of New York and New Jersey in the agency, among other changes announced by the Port Authority.
abstract: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey agrees to hire chief executive with no political ties to governors of New York or New Jersey in effort to end decades of dysfunctional infighting; search will begin in spring 2015 and is expected to end by that fall.
lead_paragraph: The move is to reduce the influence of the governors of New York and New Jersey in the agency, among other changes announced by the Port Authority.

headline.main: Addressing Dysfunction, Port Authority Plans to Install ‘Nonpolitical’ C.E.O.
headline.print_headline: Port Agency Is Creating C.E.O. Job

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
